snippet: With temperatures soaring to 117 degrees Fahrenheit, thousands in northern India stormed electricity substations and took power company officials hostage.
lead_paragraph: With temperatures soaring to 117 degrees Fahrenheit, thousands in northern India stormed electricity substations and took power company officials hostage.

headline.main: Indians Riot Over Power Cuts During Heat Wave
headline.print_headline: Indians Riot Over Power Cuts During Heat Wave
